author: Special Correspondent
text:
The airport police cracked the case of the abandoned suitcase which triggered panic at the entrance of Kempegowda International Airport on Friday evening.

According to the police, an employee in the housekeeping department, who works for an international carrier, was asked to dispose some trash from the premises. She filled the garbage in a discarded and broken suitcase, thinking she would cart it outside the airport.

But she found it inconvenient to carry the huge suitcase. She emptied the waste in a plastic bag and abandoned the suitcase near the administrative block. The CISF came across the bag while inspecting the premises and sounded an alert. P.S. Harsha, DCP (north east), said, “It was negligence on the part of the staff who had discarded the suitcase inside the airport premises.” The employee was questioned.
title: Case of mystery suitcase in airport solved
